ARABIC: خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah created the heavens and the earth with truth. There is certainly a Sign in that for the muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God has created the heavens and the earth with reason. Surely in this is a sign for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah has created the heavens and the earth in Truth. Certainly there is a Sign in this for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has created the heavens and the earth for a genuine purpose. In this there is evidence (of the truth) for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah created the heavens and the earth with the truth; indeed in this is a sign for the Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah created the heavens and the earth with truth. Verily, therein is surely a sign for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah created the heavens and the earth with truth; most surely there is a sign in this for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God created the heavens and the earth with the truth; surely in that is a sign to the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah created the heavens and the earth with truth. Lo! therein is indeed a portent for believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God has created the heavens and the earth for a purpose; surely in this there is a sign for true believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah hath created the heavens and the earth in truth; verily there in is a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah created the heavens and the earth with consummate wisdom. There is indeed a sign in that for the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): verily in that is a Sign for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah says to His Prophet Muhammad SAW): "Allah (Alone) created the heavens and the earth with truth (and none shared Him in their creation)." Verily! Therein is surely a sign for those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has created the heavens and the earth with the truth. Surely, in that there is a sign for believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God created the heavens and the earth with truth. Surely in that is a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:44] God created the heavens and the earth with truth, that is, rightly. Surely in that there is a sign, indicating His power, exalted be He, for believers — they are specifically mentioned because they are the ones to benefit thereby in their faith, in contrast to disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah created the heavens and the earth with truth) for the Truth, not for falsehood. (Lo! Therein) in the similitudes that I coined (is indeed a portent) a lesson (for believers) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.
